title: Formation of secondary aerosol from emissions of a Euro 6d-compliant gasoline vehicle with particle filter
content:
Environ. Sci.: Atmos., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EA00165B, Paper
Open Access

Andreas Paul, Zheng Fang, Patrick Martens, Arya Mukherjee, Gert Jakobi, Mika Ihalainen, Miika Kortelainen, Markus Somero, Pasi Yli-Pirilä, Thorsten Hohaus, Hendryk Czech, Markus Kalberer, Olli Sippula, Yinon Rudich, Ralf Zimmermann, Astrid Kiendler-Scharr
The most recent European regulation, the Euro 6d emission standard, require all gasoline direct injection (GDI) vehicles to use both a three-way catalyst (TWC) and a gasoline particle filter (GPF)...
